mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MANAGER_INFO (INFO_ID, emp_id, company_name, lat_company, lng_company, dateline, lx_class_id, company_yyzz, company_person, company_tel, idcard, idcard_url) VALUES (#{id}, #{emp_id}, #{company_name},#{lat_company, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{lng_company, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateline, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lx_class_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company_yyzz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company_person, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company_tel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcardUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT sn.*, le.emp_cover as emp_cover, le.emp_name as emp_name, le.emp_mobile as emp_mobile, lclass.lx_class_name as lx_class_name, lclass.lx_class_cover as lx_class_cover, ltype.type_name as type_name FROM MANAGER_INFO sn LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON sn.emp_id=le.emp_id LEFT JOIN lx_goods_type ltype ON sn.type_id=ltype.type_id LEFT JOIN lx_class lclass ON lclass.lx_class_id=sn.lx_class_id WHERE sn.emp_id=#{emp_id}

mapper.select: SELECT sn.*, le.emp_cover as emp_cover, le.emp_name as emp_name, le.emp_mobile as emp_mobile, lclass.lx_class_name as lx_class_name, lclass.lx_class_cover as lx_class_cover, ltype.type_name as type_name FROM MANAGER_INFO sn LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON sn.emp_id=le.emp_id LEFT JOIN lx_goods_type ltype ON sn.type_id=ltype.type_id LEFT JOIN lx_class lclass ON lclass.lx_class_id=sn.lx_class_id WHERE sn.emp_id=#{id}

SELECT lmanager.*, le.emp_name as nick_name, le.emp_cover as emp_cover, le.emp_mobile as emp_mobile, lclass.lx_class_name as lx_class_name, lclass.lx_class_cover as lx_class_cover, ltype.type_name as type_name FROM MANAGER_INFO lmanager LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON lmanager.emp_id=le.emp_id LEFT JOIN lx_goods_type ltype ON lmanager.type_id=ltype.type_id LEFT JOIN lx_class lclass ON lclass.lx_class_id=lmanager.lx_class_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND is_check = 1
AND (lmanager.company_name like CONCAT('%',#{cont},'%') OR lmanager.company_detail like CONCAT('%',#{cont},'%') )
AND lmanager.lx_class_id IN
#{item}
AND lmanager.is_card = '1'
order by ACOS(SIN((#{lat_company} * 3.1415) / 180 ) *SIN((lmanager.lat_company * 3.1415) / 180 ) +COS((#{lat_company} * 3.1415) / 180 ) * COS((lmanager.lat_company * 3.1415) / 180 ) *COS((#{lng_company}* 3.1415) / 180 - (lmanager.lng_company * 3.1415) / 180 ) ) * 6380 asc
ORDER BY lmanager.dateline DESC
ORDER BY (select COUNT(*) from paopao_goods lgoods where lgoods.goods_emp_id = lmanager.emp_id) desc
limit #{index},#{size}
